mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.status = 1 AND m.type IN (1, 2) ORDER BY m.sort ASC
SELECT m.* FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id WHERE rm.role_id = #{roleId} AND m.status = 1 ORDER BY m.sort ASC
SELECT * FROM sys_menu ORDER BY parent_id ASC, sort ASC
